title: Video Streaming Feature
description: Develop video streaming feature feature based on user feedback and requirements.

title: VR Data Exploration v2
description: Navigate through your data in a Tron-like virtual world. Includes motion sickness.

title: Biometric Everything v4
description: Require fingerprint, face scan, and DNA sample to upvote an idea.

title: Zen Mode
description: Replace all UI with a single breathing exercise animation. Features can wait.

title: AI-Powered Code Reviews v2
description: Implement Claude to automatically review PRs and suggest improvements with sarcastic comments when appropriate.

title: Git Blame Shield v4
description: Automatically redirect git blame to a fictional developer named 'Not Me'.

title: Faster load time
description: Lazy-load heavy components and split chunks. Implement code splitting and optimize bundle sizes for better performance.

title: Voice-Activated Commands
description: Control the app by yelling at your computer. Finally, a legitimate reason to shout at your screen.

title: Blame Distribution System
description: Evenly distribute blame for bugs across the team. Socialism for software errors.

title: Real-time Collaboration
description: Enable multiple users to work on the same document simultaneously with conflict resolution.

title: Mobile Responsiveness
description: Optimize all components for mobile devices with touch-friendly interfaces.

title: Imposter Syndrome Helper
description: Reassuring messages when you google basic syntax for the 100th time.

title: Sarcasm Linter
description: Linter that adds sarcastic comments to bad code. 'Oh great, another nested ternary.'

title: Debounced Upvoting
description: Implement debounced voting to prevent rapid clicking and improve performance.

title: Inline Editing
description: Allow users to edit items directly in the table view without opening a modal.

title: Keyboard Shortcuts
description: Implement keyboard shortcuts for common actions like search, create, navigate, etc.

title: Two-Factor Authentication
description: Add 2FA support for enhanced security using TOTP and SMS options.

title: Export to CSV/JSON
description: Allow users to export data in CSV and JSON formats with filtering options.

title: Bulk Selection and Actions
description: Enable selecting multiple items and performing bulk operations like delete, update status, etc.

title: Animations and Transitions
description: Add smooth animations and transitions for better user experience.

title: Loading States
description: Improve loading states with skeleton screens and progressive loading indicators.

title: Style Guide Page
description: Create a comprehensive style guide page showing all UI components and design patterns.

title: Export to PDF
description: Allow users to export reports and data as PDF files with custom formatting options.

title: D3.js Data Visualizations
description: Integrate D3.js for creating interactive charts including trend lines and category distributions.

title: KPI Metric Cards
description: Add dashboard cards showing total ideas, active ideas, votes, and top voted items.

title: Enhanced Sorting
description: Add comprehensive sorting options for votes, date, title, status, and category.

title: Mobile App
description: Create native mobile applications for iOS and Android with full feature parity.

title: Welcome Tutorial & Onboarding
description: Interactive tour for first-time users with tooltips, highlights, and step-by-step guidance through key features. Includes progress tracking and skip option.

title: Skeleton Loaders Implementation
description: Replace simple spinners with animated skeleton screens that match content layout. Improves perceived performance and reduces layout shift.

title: Multi-select Filtering
description: Add ability to filter by multiple statuses and categories simultaneously.

title: Global Command Palette
description: Quick actions menu accessible via Cmd/Ctrl+K with fuzzy search. Navigate, create, and perform actions without leaving the keyboard.

title: Pull-to-Refresh Mobile
description: Implement native-feeling pull-down gesture to refresh content on mobile devices. Includes custom loading animation and haptic feedback.

title: Fuzzy Search Implementation
description: Implement fuzzy search across all fields using Fuse.js for better search UX.

title: Aggressive Caching
description: Cache everything forever. Storage is cheap, user patience is not.

title: Interpretive Dance Analytics v3
description: Convert data trends into interpretive dance performances by animated stick figures.

title: Interactive Chart Tooltips
description: Enhanced data visualizations with drill-down capabilities, detailed tooltips on hover, and click-to-explore functionality for deeper insights.

title: Accessibility Improvements
description: Add ARIA labels, keyboard navigation support, and screen reader compatibility throughout the application.

title: Skip Links for Accessibility
description: Add skip navigation links for screen reader users. Includes 'Skip to main content', 'Skip to navigation', and custom landmark navigation.

title: Optimistic UI Updates
description: Implement instant feedback for user actions with rollback on failure. Includes visual indicators for pending states and smooth transitions.

title: Auto-save Draft Functionality
description: Add draft persistence for forms with automatic saving to localStorage and recovery options.

title: Smart Form Suggestions
description: AI-powered field suggestions based on user context, history, and common patterns. Includes auto-complete and smart defaults.

title: Custom Error Pages
description: Design friendly 404/500 error pages with helpful recovery actions, search functionality, and suggested links. Includes error reporting option.

title: Clippy Assistant v4
description: Bring back Clippy to help with form submissions. 'It looks like you're trying to submit an idea!'

title: User Preference Panel
description: Comprehensive settings page for customizable shortcuts, themes, notification preferences, and personalized dashboard widgets.

title: Comprehensive Form Validation
description: Implement real-time validation feedback with VeeValidate, including custom validation rules and error messages.

title: Emoji-Only Mode
description: Replace all text with emojis for international compatibility. üåçüíª‚ú®

title: Slack integration
description: Send notifications to Slack when state changes. Integrate webhooks for real-time updates.

title: Stack Overflow Integration v3
description: Automatically search Stack Overflow when errors occur. Copy-paste solutions with attribution.

title: Predictive Issue Detection v3
